content: {"name": "Salvation Army - Greater Philadelphia", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Appointment not required, but they prefer if you call ahead so they can have your food box ready", "email": "", "url": "https://easternusa.salvationarmy.org/eastern-pennsylvania/philadelphia-central/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "3225 Reed Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Grays Ferry", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19146", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.9370679, "longitude": -75.197445}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 465-0300", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Provide prepacked bags or boxes of food"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
